CustomField.formula: IF( Site__r.Account__r.Record_Type_Name__c ='Commercial',Site__r.Account__r.Name &BR(),"")& IF( ISBLANK(Site__r.Site_Street__c) , "",Site__r.Site_Street__c &BR() )& IF( ISBLANK(Site__r.Site_City__c) , "",Site__r.Site_City__c &BR() )& IF( ISBLANK(Site__r.Site_State__c) , "",Site__r.Site_State__c &BR() )& IF( ISBLANK(Site__r.Site_PostalCode__c) ,"", Site__r.Site_PostalCode__c &BR() )& IF( ISBLANK(Site__r.Site_Country__c) ,"", Site__r.Site_Country__c &BR() )
CustomField.label: Test formula
